title: Pixel 3 keep resetting
content:
Hello, I am using a Pixel 3 and yesterday the phone started to keep resetting, when I plug in to charge it. 

I take it out and the phone still keep resetting until he run off battery. In this time I tried to make a hard reset but he still keep resetting and just from time to time i was able to enter the hard reset menu.

He does this every time after i reset it and try to charge it.

Does everyone know why it is still happening?
